sentences.english: His heart is beating violently in her breast.
sentences.chinese: 他的心在胸膛裏激烈地跳動。

sentences.english: That reflected in the thick snow on the sun, my happiness reflects the chest.
sentences.chinese: 那映在厚厚雪地上的陽光，將我的快樂折射出胸膛。

sentences.english: The words hit June like a pebble, in the ribs.
sentences.chinese: 這些話就像鵝孵石一樣打中瓊的胸膛。

sentences.english: Harper wasn’t interested in going back to prison, and so he killed himself with a bullet to the chest.
sentences.chinese: 哈珀不想再回到監獄，所以他擊穿自己的胸膛自殺了。

sentences.english: Hester's first motion had been to cover her bosom with her clasped hands.
sentences.chinese: 海絲特的第一個動作就是想用合着的雙手來捂住胸膛。

sentences.english: For many of my arrows left my bow only to seek my own breast.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我許多離弦的箭只爲尋找我自己的胸膛。

sentences.english: They threw their chests out when marching in parade.
sentences.chinese: 他們在列隊行進時都挺起了胸膛。

sentences.english: The words hit June like a pebble , in the ribs.
sentences.chinese: 這些話就象鵝孵石一樣打中瓊的胸膛。

sentences.english: Shattered her breast in the moonlight and warned him-with her death.
sentences.chinese: 在月光下，侵潤了她的胸膛，以她的心來警告他。

sentences.english: They say the nightingale pierces his bosom with a thorn when he sings his love song.
sentences.chinese: 他們說夜鶯唱出戀歌時，用荊棘刺穿自己的胸膛。

sentences.english: But we, when we put the thorns in our breasts, we know. We understand.
sentences.chinese: 但是，當我們把棘刺扎進胸膛時，我們是知道的。

sentences.english: He wore a shirt, with the neck open, showing his.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着一個開領襯衣，露着胸膛。

sentences.english: Just rub Tiger Balm on the chest and cover with a warm towel.
sentences.chinese: 因此把老虎油塗抹在胸膛時應該蓋上一塊熱毛巾。

sentences.english: Rip them up the belly. Shoot them in the guts.
sentences.chinese: 挑開他們的肚子，給他們的胸膛上來上一槍。

sentences.english: If snow be white, why then her breasts are dun;
sentences.chinese: 雪若算白，她的胸膛便算褐色蒼蒼。

definition: pit of the stomach/solar plexus/words and thoughts
the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
the back of the human body
the front piece(s) of a Chinese jacket/lapel
